column4: i just did a fresh install of 10.04 on a homebuilt machine that also runs windows xp, and in the windows session i get 20+mbps down from speedtest net, but when i try it in ubuntu i get like 1.5mbps down, is there something i need to edit in my network settings
infact my upload speed is faster than my download speed, never seen anything like it
that happens to me all the time because of network congestion at my ISP.  Rofl.
